divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend and I were heading to dinner after I got off work.We were walking out the front door and a bright white moving star like craft caught our eyes immediately. It was moving towards us about 5-10k feet,speed 100-200 tops moving silently from Seattle which is south heading north over Bothell Mill Creek and Between Everett and Snohomish.After it flew over head at 9-05pm or 9-10 heading North the brilliantly bright white like faded out.We got just got back from dinner I thought I would just check and wasn't going to write but I looked anyway and another guy saw it flying North so I had too. J
Summary: Bright like a star but moved like UFO
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Everett
There was one other sighting in Everett on or around September 11th 2009
